"Aber no ara mu na esuafo no baa Jesus: "Na ɔfrɛɛ abofraba bi baa ne nkyɛn
Woana na ɔyɛ kɛse wɔ sor ahenman no mu?: na ɔdze no gyinaa hɔn finimfin
column7: gyedɛ hom dan na hom yɛ dɛ mbofraba
column8: ɔno hom runntum nnhɛn Nyankopɔn ahenman no mu da."

"Aber no ara mu na esuafo no baa Jesus: "Dɛm ntsi
Woana na ɔyɛ kɛse wɔ sor ahenman no mu?: obiara a ɔbɛbrɛ noho adze dɛ abofraba yi no
"#Luk 22.24": ɔnoara na ɔyɛ kɛse wɔ sor ahenman no mu."

"Aber no ara mu na esuafo no baa Jesus: "Na obiara a ɔbɛgye abofraba a ɔtse dɛm yi kor wɔ me dzin mu no
Woana na ɔyɛ kɛse wɔ sor ahenman no mu?: ɔgye emi mara."

"Aber no ara mu na esuafo no baa Jesus: "Sɛ hom mu obiara to mbofra nkakraba a wɔgye me dzi yi mu baako fintsidua a
Woana na ɔyɛ kɛse wɔ sor ahenman no mu?: oye ma no dɛ wɔdze ewuyambo kɛse sɛn no kɔn mu
"#Luk 22.24": na wɔkɔtow no kyen nsu mu wɔ po bun mu."

"Aber no ara mu na esuafo no baa Jesus: "Fintsiduato ntsi wiadze ndue! Na otwar dɛ fintsiduato ba
Woana na ɔyɛ kɛse wɔ sor ahenman no mu?: na nyimpa a fintsidua nam no do ba no
"#Luk 22.24": ndue!"

"Aber no ara mu na esuafo no baa Jesus: "Na sɛ wo nsa anaa wo nan to wo fintsidua a
Woana na ɔyɛ kɛse wɔ sor ahenman no mu?: twa
"#Luk 22.24": na tow fi woho kyen: oye ma wo dɛ edze abasin anaa anansin bɔkɔ nkwa mu kyɛn dɛ ewɔ wo nsa ebien nye w’anan ebien
column5: na wɔbɔtow wo akyen onnyiewiei gya mu."

"Aber no ara mu na esuafo no baa Jesus: "Na sɛ w’enyiwa to wo fintsidua a
Woana na ɔyɛ kɛse wɔ sor ahenman no mu?: tu
"#Luk 22.24": na tow fi woho kyen. Oye ma wo dɛ edze enyiwa kor bɔkɔ nkwa mu kyɛn dɛ ewɔ enyiwa ebien na wɔbɔtow wo akyen ogya amandzehu kurow mu."

"Aber no ara mu na esuafo no baa Jesus: "Hom nhwɛ yie mma hom eemmbu nkakraba yi mu baako enyimtsia
Woana na ɔyɛ kɛse wɔ sor ahenman no mu?: na mese hom dɛ ɔsor noho hɔn abɔfoe hwɛ m’Egya a ɔwɔ sor no enyim daa."

"Aber no ara mu na esuafo no baa Jesus: "(Na nyimpa Ba no bae dɛ ɔrebɛgye dza ayew no nkwa.)"
Woana na ɔyɛ kɛse wɔ sor ahenman no mu?: "#18.11 Dɛm nkyekyɛmu yi nnka ho asɔpɔn no mbom tsetse akyerɛwfo no bi dze ka ho."

"Aber no ara mu na esuafo no baa Jesus: "Hom dwen dɛn? Sɛ nyimpa bi wɔ nguan ɔha
Woana na ɔyɛ kɛse wɔ sor ahenman no mu?: na hɔn mu baako tɔ gon a
"#Luk 22.24": ana onngyaa eduokron akron no hɔ
column5: na ɔnnkɔ nkokwaa do nnkɔhwehwɛ dza ɔayew no?"

"Aber no ara mu na esuafo no baa Jesus: "Na sɛ ɔba dɛ ohu no a
Woana na ɔyɛ kɛse wɔ sor ahenman no mu?: nokwar mese hom dɛ odzi dɛw wɔ no ho kyɛn eduokron akron no a wɔanntɔ gon no."

"Aber no ara mu na esuafo no baa Jesus: "Dɛmara na ɔnnyɛ hom Egya a ɔwɔ sor ne pɛ dɛ nkakraba yi mu baako bɛyew."
"Na sɛ wo nua fom wo a
Woana na ɔyɛ kɛse wɔ sor ahenman no mu?: kɔ na keyi no atsɛn wɔ ɔwo nye ɔno nko ntamu: sɛ otsie wo a
"#Luk 22.24": enya wo nua."

"Aber no ara mu na esuafo no baa Jesus: "Na sɛ oenntsie wo a
Woana na ɔyɛ kɛse wɔ sor ahenman no mu?: fa kor anaa ebien ka woho
"#Luk 22.24": ama nyimpa beenu anaa baasa aayɛ asɛm no ho adasefo."

"Aber no ara mu na esuafo no baa Jesus: "Na sɛ ɔpow dɛ obetsie hɔn a
Woana na ɔyɛ kɛse wɔ sor ahenman no mu?: kɛka kyerɛ asɔr no
"#Luk 22.24": na sɛ ɔpow dɛ obetsie asɔr so a
column5: bu no dɛ amanamamfo mu baako nye towgyenyi."

"Aber no ara mu na esuafo no baa Jesus: "Nokwar mese hom dɛ
Woana na ɔyɛ kɛse wɔ sor ahenman no mu?: Biribiara a hom bɛkyekyer wɔ asaase do no
"#Luk 22.24": wɔbɛkyekyer no wɔ sor; na biribiara a hom bɛsan wɔ asaase do no

"Aber no ara mu na esuafo no baa Jesus: "Bio
Woana na ɔyɛ kɛse wɔ sor ahenman no mu?: mese hom dɛ
"#Luk 22.24": Sɛ hom mu beenu yɛ anokor wɔ asaase do wɔ biribi a wobebisa ho a
column5: m’Egya a ɔwɔ sor bɛyɛ ama hɔn."

"Aber no ara mu na esuafo no baa Jesus: "Na mbrɛ beenu anaa baasa ehyia wɔ me dzin mu no
Woana na ɔyɛ kɛse wɔ sor ahenman no mu?: nna mowɔ hɔn finimfin."

"Aber no ara mu na esuafo no baa Jesus: "Nna Peter bae bɛsee no dɛ
Woana na ɔyɛ kɛse wɔ sor ahenman no mu?: Ewuradze
"#Luk 22.24": mpɛn ahen na mo nua fom me a
column5: memfa nkyɛ no? Onkodu mpɛn esuon anaa?"

"Aber no ara mu na esuafo no baa Jesus: "Jesus see no dɛ
Woana na ɔyɛ kɛse wɔ sor ahenman no mu?: Mennse wo dɛ onkodu mpɛn esuon
"#Luk 22.24": na mpɛn eduosuon mbɔho esuon."

"Aber no ara mu na esuafo no baa Jesus: "Dɛm ntsi sor ahenman no tse dɛ ɔhen bi a ɔpɛɛ dɛ ɔnye no nkowaa bu nkontaa."
"Na ɔhyɛɛ ase rubu no
Woana na ɔyɛ kɛse wɔ sor ahenman no mu?: wɔdze baako a ɔmaa no talent      mpemdu brɛɛ no."
"#Luk 22.24": "#18.24 TALENT: Yɛ dɛm ber no mu ɔpaanyi ne mfe duenum akatua."

"Aber no ara mu na esuafo no baa Jesus: "Na osiandɛ onnyi dza ɔdze botua ntsi
Woana na ɔyɛ kɛse wɔ sor ahenman no mu?: no wura hyɛɛ dɛ wɔntɔn ɔno
"#Luk 22.24": nye ne yer
column6: nye dza ɔwɔ nyina mfa ntua kaw."

"Aber no ara mu na esuafo no baa Jesus: "Dɛm ntsi akowaa no hwee daadze wɔ n’enyim
Woana na ɔyɛ kɛse wɔ sor ahenman no mu?: na ɔtotɔɔe serɛɛ no dɛ
"#Luk 22.24": Mo wura

"Aber no ara mu na esuafo no baa Jesus: "Na akowaa no wura ne yamu hyehyee no
Woana na ɔyɛ kɛse wɔ sor ahenman no mu?: na ogyaa no
"#Luk 22.24": na ɔdze kaw no kyɛɛ no."

"Aber no ara mu na esuafo no baa Jesus: "Na akowaa noara fiir edzi kohun no wura no nkowaa no mu baako a ɔdze no kaw kakraabi denare ɔha;     na osuoo no mu
Woana na ɔyɛ kɛse wɔ sor ahenman no mu?: na ɔtɔɔr ne meneba dɛ
"#Luk 22.24": Tua dza edze me."
column5: "#18.28 DENARE: Denare kor yɛ dɛm ber no mu ɔpaanyi ne dakor akatua."

"Aber no ara mu na esuafo no baa Jesus: "Na akowaa no hwee daadze wɔ n’enyim na ɔserɛɛ no dɛ
Woana na ɔyɛ kɛse wɔ sor ahenman no mu?: Nya abotar wɔ mo ho
"#Luk 22.24": na mubotua wo."

"Aber no ara mu na esuafo no baa Jesus: "Na ɔno dze
Woana na ɔyɛ kɛse wɔ sor ahenman no mu?: ɔammpen
"#Luk 22.24": na ɔkɔree dze no kɔtoo efiadze dɛ onkodu dɛ obotua dza ɔdze no no."

"Aber no ara mu na esuafo no baa Jesus: "Na no wura no nkowaa no hun dza esi no
Woana na ɔyɛ kɛse wɔ sor ahenman no mu?: ɔyɛɛ hɔn yaw dɛ
"#Luk 22.24": na wɔkɔree kɛkaa dza esi no nyina kyerɛɛ hɔn wura."

"Aber no ara mu na esuafo no baa Jesus: "Na no wura frɛɛ no see no dɛ
Woana na ɔyɛ kɛse wɔ sor ahenman no mu?: Akowaa bɔn
"#Luk 22.24": medze wo kaw no nyina kyɛɛ wo osiandɛ eserɛɛ me ntsi:"

"Aber no ara mu na esuafo no baa Jesus: "ana ɔnnsɛ wo so dɛ nkyɛ ihu wo nyɛnko akowaa no mbɔbɔr
Woana na ɔyɛ kɛse wɔ sor ahenman no mu?: dɛ mbrɛ muhun wo mbɔbɔr no?"

"Aber no ara mu na esuafo no baa Jesus: "Na no wura no bo fuwii
Woana na ɔyɛ kɛse wɔ sor ahenman no mu?: na oyii no maa ahohiahiafo dɛ wɔntseetsee no araa nkodu dɛ obotua ne kaw no nyinara."

"Aber no ara mu na esuafo no baa Jesus: "Dɛmara na mo sor Egya bɛyɛ hom
Woana na ɔyɛ kɛse wɔ sor ahenman no mu?: sɛ hom emmfi hom akoma mu ammfa obiara no nua no bɔn annkyɛ no a."
